pullRequest.title: Add nginx docker for map upload server
pullRequest.bodyText:
The nginx server will be used for hosting static resources (maps).
This update adds start/stop scrips and a README for launching
a nginx locally.

Testing

Screens Shots

Additional Notes to Reviewer

Release Note

commit.message:
Add nginx docker for map upload server

The nginx server will be used for hosting static resources (maps).
This update adds start/stop scrips and a README for launching
a nginx locally.
Double quote variable value in shell script (fix shellcheck)

beforeCommit.message: Double quote variable value in shell script (fix shellcheck)

afterCommit.message: Double quote variable value in shell script (fix shellcheck)

nodes.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: [no-consecutive-blank-lines] Remove 1 line after node
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+## Nginx Docker for Maps Server
+
+Use the start and stop scripts in this folder to start and stop
+a nginx server.
+
+Map files available for download are hosted on a nginx server.
+We define a folder mount that is made available to the nginx
+server from where it can serve static reosurces (map zips).
+
+To simulate the entire stack, you'll also need to start a docker
+database and the map upload server.
